meanings.sent1: She determinates the movie they will watch every Friday night.
meanings.sent2: He determinates the best route to take before starting the journey.
meanings.sent3: The magic coin determinates whether it will be a good or bad day.
meanings.sent4: Her smile determinates the mood of the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The final exam determinates their grades for the semester.

meanings.definition: A factor that decisively affects the nature or outcome of something
meanings.sent1: The weather is a determinates in deciding if the picnic will happen.
meanings.sent2: The availability of funds is a crucial determinates in starting a business.
meanings.sent3: The color of the walls turned out to be the determinates of the room's ambiance.
meanings.sent4: His leadership skills became the determinates of the team's success.
meanings.sent5: The quality of ingredients is a determinates in making a delicious meal.
